title: de Blob 2 – v0.15
body:
de Blob 2 – v0.15


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Jump and run, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Blue Tongue Entertainment / THQ Nordic
Languages: ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 6.9 GB
Repack Size: 5.3 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc [Single Direct Link] (Upto 100MB/s, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on de.Blob.2-CODEX ISO release: codex-de.blob.2.iso (7,409,827,840 bytes)
  • Update 0.15 (12943) applied over, now controls work under Windows 7
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 6.9 to 5.3 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-5 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 13 GB
  • Use “language_setup.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • Some GFX options can be changed via Launcher.exe in game root. Remember NOT to run the game with this launcher, cause it always runs the game in English
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

In de Blob 2 Comrade Black and the Inkies are back with a whole new plot to rid the world of color. With all-new help from Papa Blanc and his flock of followers the Blancs, Blob and his friends will have their work cut out for them bringing color back to the citizens of Prisma City. Set off on an action-packed color adventure where custom paints, patterns and music bring the world to life. De Blob 2 is a creative evolution driven by your imagination.

Game Features

  • Upscaled videos
  • Added FXAA Anti Aliasing
  • Added Resolution and graphic quality option
  • Keyboard & mouse and Gamepad (360/ps4) support and UI adaptation, also added remap feature
  • Unofficial Wiimote support
